name: Biomedical Technician Training
short_description:
This project contains material that can be used to create training courses for biomeidcal technicians and engineers. The material was initially created for use in low income settings, but much of the information will be related to biomedical technicians around the world.

At the time of writing, the following organisations have contributed towards the material:

- Amalthea Trust
